messages.content:
I'll translate the Arabic text and place it inline with the corresponding English content. The document appears to be a bilingual training outline focused on sustainable building practices in Iraq.

# Modular Training / تدريب وحدات
(Title note: "Bilal + Modular training" appears at the top)

## Module One: Sustainable Foundations — Building Resilient Homes for Iraq's Future
*Arabic note: رسم تصميم مبسط لمنزل مستدام . مشروع تجريبي لتصميم منزل مستدام*
(Translation: Simple design drawing of a sustainable home. Pilot project for designing a sustainable home.)

### Part 1: Understanding Iraq's Sustainability Challenges
*Arabic note: إدخال دراسة البناء الأخضر للعراق*
(Translation: Introduction to green building study for Iraq)

- The Hidden Cost of Modern Home Construction
*Arabic note: كثير من المواد الحالية وطرق البناء*
(Translation: Many current materials and building methods)

- The Climate Crisis
*Arabic note: البيئة أصبحت أكثر حرارة وغير مستقر. التعديل مع قيود طول*
(Translation: The environment has become hotter and unstable. Adaptation with length constraints)

### Part 2: Green Building Solutions—Building a Better Future
*Arabic note: تحسين منازلنا لتكون صديقة للبيئة*
(Translation: Improving our homes to be environmentally friendly)

- Green Construction: Building a Sustainable Future
- Designing a Green Home

### Part 3: Applying Heritage Principles to Safeguard Our Homes
*Arabic note: معلومات عن تقييم المنازل*
(Translation: Information about home assessment)

- Energy Audits
- Conducting a Home Assessment
*Arabic note: مشروع: التقييم الذاتي للمنازل إستخدام نموذج تقييم لمنزلك*
(Translation: Project: Self-assessment of homes using an assessment model for your house)

## Module Two: Solar Energy and Energy Modelling
*Arabic note: تصميم مع طاقة شمسية مستدامة وتحليل طاقة*
(Translation: Design with sustainable solar energy and energy analysis)

### Part 1: Understanding Iraq's Sustainability Challenges
*Arabic note: ساعة واحدة*
(Translation: One hour)

- The Hidden Cost of Traditional Construction
- The Climate Crisis

### Part 2: Solar Energy and Energy Modeling
*Arabic note: نظام كهربائي للمنزل للطاقة الشمسية*
(Translation: Electrical system for home solar energy)

- Harnessing Solar Power
- Energy Modeling Tools

*Side note: load + site assessment, type of solar system, PV system parts, connection electrical loss + protection, battery type + test, light + angles with tutorial, PV feasibility (calculation + practice)*

### Part 3: Solar Energy and Energy Modeling Practice
*Arabic note: طريقة كهربائية للبيت وتركيب وتوليد. استخدام أدوات للتصميم ومعالجات*
(Translation: Electrical method for house installation and generation. Using tools for design and solutions)

- Practical Application

## Module Three: Insulation and Ventilation
*Arabic note: مكافحة + تهوية*
(Translation: Insulation + ventilation)

### Part 1: Understanding Iraq's Sustainability Challenges
*Arabic note: ساعة واحدة*
(Translation: One hour)

- The Hidden Cost of Traditional Construction
*Arabic note: تحليل اقتصادي للبناء التقليدي*
(Translation: Economic analysis of traditional construction)

- The Climate Crisis
*Arabic note: التأثيرات البيئية للجدران الحرارية وسد للتسرب الحراري*
(Translation: Environmental effects of thermal walls and sealing for thermal leakage)

### Part 2: Insulation and Ventilation
*Arabic note: تقنيات عزل وتسريب الهواء*
(Translation: Insulation techniques and air leakage)

- Energy-Efficient Insulation
*Arabic note: عملية خاصة بعزوم الحرارة*
(Translation: Special process for heat insulation)

- Ventilation Techniques
*Arabic note: ربط التهوية والسماح لحرارات متوازنة*
(Translation: Connecting ventilation and allowing balanced temperatures)

- Insulation Materials
*Arabic note: المواد العازلة ميزاتها وخصائصها*
(Translation: Insulation materials, their features and characteristics)

### Part 3: Insulation and Ventilation Practice
*Arabic note: المستوى حساب شامل وعملي*
(Translation: Comprehensive and practical calculation level)

- Practical Application
*Arabic note: التصرف بالحرارة والرطوبة والتقييم فعال استخدام مواد محلية*
(Translation: Managing heat and humidity and effective evaluation using local materials)

## Module Four: Study the Past Build The Future
*Arabic note: صناعة المعايير المعمارية المتوافقة مع تغير المناخ وتجارب ناجحة*
(Translation: Creating architectural standards compatible with climate change and successful experiences)

### Part 1: Sustainability - Study the Past, Build the Future
*Arabic note: البناء التقليدي الموروث*
(Translation: Traditional inherited building)

- Learning from the Past
*Arabic note: الاستفادة من التراث المعماري وتطبيقاته*
(Translation: Benefiting from architectural heritage and its applications)

- Modern Sustainability Inspired by History
*Arabic note: استخدام تقنية التصميم العراقية*
(Translation: Using Iraqi design technique)

### Part 2: Iraqi Architectural Heritage
*Arabic note: معمارية وهندسة مستديمة في التراث*
(Translation: Sustainable architecture and engineering in heritage)

- Sustainable Features in Traditional Architecture
- Islamic Architecture and Sustainability
*Arabic note: عناصر معمارية وهندسية متوافقة مع البيئة*
(Translation: Architectural and engineering elements compatible with the environment)

### Part 3: Sustainable Innovations in Iraq
*Arabic note: فهم على تقييم عناصر المستدامة والتقليدية تطوير مواد وتقنيات محلية*
(Translation: Understanding the evaluation of sustainable and traditional elements, developing local materials and techniques)

- Harnessing Modern Technologies
*Arabic note: دمج على لتقييم عناصر المستدامة والتقليدية في برنامج منزلي عراقي*
(Translation: Integration for evaluating sustainable and traditional elements in an Iraqi home program)

- Combining Old and New
*Arabic note: تعلم كيف تخطيط منزل بطرق حديثة وتطوير محتوى إرشادي محلي باستخدام المبادئ والأساليب*
(Translation: Learn how to plan a house with modern methods and develop local guidance content using principles and methods)

*Footer note: total 250*

messages.content:
I'll translate the Arabic notes in this document, placing them inline with the corresponding English text. This appears to be a curriculum outline for a sustainable building training program in Iraq, with handwritten Arabic notes throughout.

## Module Four: Study the Past Build The Future
*Arabic notes:* صناعة المعايير المعمارية المتوافقة مع تغير المناخ وتجارب ناجحة
(Translation: Creating architectural standards compatible with climate change and successful experiences)

### Part 1: Sustainability - Study the Past, Build the Future
*Arabic notes:* البناء التقليدي الموروث
(Translation: Traditional inherited building)

- Learning from the Past
*Arabic notes:* الاستفادة من التراث المعماري وتطبيقاته
(Translation: Benefiting from architectural heritage and its applications)

- Modern Sustainability Inspired by History
*Arabic notes:* استخدام تقنية التصميم العراقية
(Translation: Using Iraqi design technique)

### Part 2: Iraqi Architectural Heritage
*Arabic notes:* معمارية وهندسة مستديمة في التراث
(Translation: Sustainable architecture and engineering in heritage)

- Sustainable Features in Traditional Architecture
- Islamic Architecture and Sustainability
*Arabic notes:* عناصر معمارية وهندسية متوافقة مع البيئة
(Translation: Architectural and engineering elements compatible with the environment)

### Part 3: Sustainable Innovations in Iraq
*Arabic notes:* فهم على تقييم عناصر المستدامة والتقليدية تطوير مواد وتقنيات محلية
(Translation: Understanding the evaluation of sustainable and traditional elements, developing local materials and techniques)

- Harnessing Modern Technologies
*Arabic notes:* دمج على لتقييم عناصر المستدامة والتقليدية في برنامج منزلي عراقي
(Translation: Integration for evaluating sustainable and traditional elements in an Iraqi home program)

- Combining Old and New
*Arabic notes:* تعلم كيف تخطيط منزل بطرق حديثة وتطوير محتوى إرشادي محلي باستخدام المبادئ والأساليب
(Translation: Learn how to plan a house with modern methods and develop local guidance content using principles and methods)

*Page note:* total 250
